DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot project determine feasibility acceptability propose method subsequent clinical trial tailor self-management program ( PACT ) design decrease pain participant temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) . The PACT program personalize program exercise behavioral change implement web-based program support health coach . For feasibility acceptability study , 80 adult TMD pain randomize either PACT program traditional self-care .
DOC.brief_title: Tailored Self-Management Temporomandibular Disorders ( TMD ) Using Health Information Technology
DOC.detailed_description: The primary study objective PACT study two-fold : 1 . Evaluate feasibility method conduct full-scale multi-site randomized clinical trial compare PACT self-management traditional self-care TMD . The study also evaluate strategy : identify , recruit , consent , enroll eligible subject group meet target goal ; evaluate adherence intervention identification barrier ; evaluate adherence outcome assessment , evaluate on-line web-site functionality acceptability . 2 . To demonstrate ability accurately capture outcome measure use multi-site study . Primary study objective : Recruitment measure achievement target sample , number patient identified meet eligibility criterion , number ( % ) subject consent compare total contact . Intervention adherence measure : number participant enrol group , number participant access on-line material , completion practice log , identification self-reported barrier participation self-care . Outcome adherence measure number participant complete baseline assessment , complete two four month follow-up assessment , complete program evaluation , complete qualitative post-study interview . Website acceptability measure identification problem barrier use quality ease use post-intervention evaluation . Second objective : Efficacy program measure self-reported outcome assessment . The primary outcome include TMD symptom , jaw functioning , emotional functioning . Secondary outcome measure include symptom severity temporal aspect pain , pain interference , patient rating improvement . Additional information mediator modifier also gather help inform intervention effect . Mediators measure identify factor help explain PACT may effect include self-efficacy , patient activation , exercise level , sleep quality , social support . Contextual process factor identify intervention work include disability status , catastrophizing , depression , repetitive strain oral habit , perceive stress .
DOC.criteria: In order eligible participate study , individual must meet following criterion : Age 18 old Able willing access internet regular basis Able read speak English Be willing comply study procedure : 1 . Randomly assign either arm study 2 . Be available duration study 3 . Complete study data collection form 4 . Reachable phone able participate weekly phone coach call randomize PACT arm Have diagnosis TMD pain use selfreport screener . These question include ; 1 . In last 30 day , follow best describes pain jaw temple area either side ? 2 . In last 30 day , pain stiffness jaw awaken ? 3 . In last 30 day , follow activity change pain ( , make good make bad ) jaw temple area either side ? Chewing hard tough food , Opening mouth move jaw forward side , Jaw habit hold teeth together , clenching/grinding , chew gum , jaw activity talk , kissing , yawn Frequency TMD pain week pain past 6 month Electronically sign informed consent form An individual meet follow criterion exclude participation study : Currently participate TMD temporomandibular joint ( TMJ ) relate study Major disk disorder require opioids surgery TMD pain Serious medical condition might interfere prohibit participation online program pregnancy Treatment mental health disorder substance abuse past six month
